Minister for Culture announces funding for over 100 international tours by Irish musicians

news.title: Sylosis announce headline show at The Academy, Dublin
news.summary: The heavy metal group will be joined by special guests Revocation, Distant and Life Cycles.

news.title: Bricknasty announce biggest Irish show to date at Dublin's 3Olympia Theatre
news.summary: Until their December show, the group will be performing at All Together Now in July, as well as supporting KNEECAP in early September

news.title: A quarter of Irish pubs have closed in the last 20 years
news.summary: There has been "a pattern of pub closures across Ireland, particularly in rural Ireland in recent years," according to the report's author.

news.title: Hardwicke Circus's Ukraine Tour Diary - Part 4: Heroes of the Revolution
news.summary: In the latest instalment of Tom Foster’s diary, he gets an insight into the true cost of the Ukrainian war, as well as recalling an emergency retreat to the bunker – and playing a theatre on the Dnipro river…
